resources.string: Sorry! This device does not support Rotation Vector Sensor.
Couldn\'t launch wallpaper chooser. You can still activate Live Slider by choosing \"Live Wallpapers\" in your home screen wallpaper picker.

This Live Wallpaper can produce a parallax effect by slightly offsetting the position of the wallpaper.
*It is required to obtain the device\'s rotation angle data from Rotation Vector Sensor in real time. You can check whether your device supports the sensor by rotating the device and seeing whether the cube below changes its perspective.
Please select a wallpapers playlist to enable slideshow!
You can activate and edit wallpapers in this playlist right here and any previous selected wallpaper will be changed respectively.
Are you sure you want to disable current Playlist slideshow and continue with current single wallpaper selectionâ€¦
Pause everything in battery saver mode
